channel.title: We are making original animes and apps for anime creators. on Studio Mizutama Official Site
channel.description: Recent content in We are making original animes and apps for anime creators. on Studio Mizutama Official Site

item.title: WITH YOU
item.description: Introduction With You / Kimi to Issho ni is a short independent animation movie launched from Japan. The anime illustrates young lovers' runaway, struggling between life or death.

item.title: MIZUTAMA PAINT
item.description: Mizutama Paint is open source storyboarding tool. Make it easy to build storyboard, set sequence, timing.
